name: Nick Shows Quiz | Assorted TV Trivia for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: On "Dora the Explorer", what is the name of the fox?
questions.explanation:
Swiper.

	Swiper has a purple mask.

questions.text: On "Sabrina the Teenage Witch", who doesn't like Sabrina?
On "Chalkzone", what is the name of Rudy's blue friend?
questions.explanation:
Snap.

	Snap is Rudy's best friend.

questions.text: On "Blue's Clues", what is the name of the clock?
questions.explanation:
Tickety-Tock.

	The mailbox's name is Mailbox in this show.

questions.text: On "Rocket Power", whose last name is Dullard?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	The "Rocket Gang" is made up of Reggie, Otto, Twister and Sam.

questions.text: On "Rugrats", what is the name of Chuckie's dad?
questions.explanation:
Chas.

	Chas has red hair and glasses.

questions.text: On "The Cosby Show", what is the name of Cliff's wife?
questions.explanation:
Clair.

	Sondra is the oldest kid in this show.

questions.text: On "Roseanne", what is the name of the oldest kid?
On "The Cosby Show", what is the name of Rudy's best friend?
questions.explanation:
Kenny.

	Rudy is the youngest Huxtable kid.

questions.text: On "Full House", what is the name of the Tanners' uncle?
questions.explanation:
Jesse.

	Jesse moved in because Danny asked him to.  Joey is Danny's best friend.
